title: Add ability to add a custom initializer.
message:
Add ability to add a custom initializer.

This is needed in cases where a particle system's
initializer needs to be updated on the fly (such as from
a sensor listener). Prior to this a new ParticleSystem
would have to be created or extra initializers would have
to be added. Since the extra initializers simply override
the previous initialization, they bloat memory.

Fixes #75

title: Merge pull request #46 from nominator/patch-1
message:
Merge pull request #46 from nominator/patch-1

Fixed a memory leak in ParticleSystem.java

title: Fixed a memory leak in ParticleSystem.java
message:
Fixed a memory leak in ParticleSystem.java

The anonymous inner class 'TimerTask' had an implicit reference to ParticleSystem class instance. The ParticleSystem instance holds reference to mDrawingView which in turn holds reference to the Context (thus leaking activity). TimerTask is implemented as a static class to avoid holding implicit reference of its outer class ParticleSystem.
